channel.title: A simple issue
channel.description:
Ok, i have added donator icons and other higher rank icons etc.
i have added it about 50%, meaning i can see the icon next to my name, but when i type other people cant see the icon.. i have tried a couple things and nothing has seemed to work, can anyone help?
thanks so much in advance.

item.title: A simple issue
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

imsokool22:

lol make sure that both the guys are donator and that they have the same donator = 1

you obviously dont know what your talking about…
if you are a donator, you yourself can see the icon next to your name when YOU type. and other people cant.
making the other person a donator wouldnt fix anything…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2010, 03:08:33 pm[/size][hr]/bump -.-

Read full topic

item.title: A simple issue
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

wow, thats definately not the fix, because i tested this with myself…

ran the same client twice, logged in as one person, and logged in as another person, one was a donator, other wasnt.

I typed a couple A’s, on the screen with the donator i could see the icon because I myself was a donator, but on the other screen i couldnt see the donator icon.

Read full topic

make sure they have your client or it wont work.
